name: Day 0 icon
CSS
format:
<style>
    .filled {
        height: 100% !important;
        padding: 0 !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding: 0;
        margin: 0;
    }
    .rounded {
        border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
    }
    .bigfont {
        font-size: 18px;
    }
    .smallfont {
        font-size: 12px;
    }
</style>
 
<script>
    $('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
        navigator.vibrate(100);
    });

    function restore_bg(x) {
        $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

    $('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
        var x = $(this).css("background-color");
        $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");

        setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this, x), 200);
        navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
</script>

name: Day 1 icon
Day 0
format:
<script src="/myjs/skycons.js"></script>
<script>
    var skyconDefaults = {"monochrome": false 
        // "colors": { 
        //       "main": "#779966", 
        //       "moon":"#666666",
        //       "fog": "#555522",
        //       "fogbank": "#884488",
        //       "cloud": "#999999",
        //       "snow": "#aaaaaa",
        //       "leaf":"#00ff00",
        //       "rain": "#00ffff",
        //       "sun": "#ff3300"
        //    }
        };
</script>


<canvas id="icon0" width="48" height="48"></canvas>

<script>
var skycons0 = new Skycons(skyconDefaults); 
skycons0.play();
 
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
           if (data=="clear-day") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.CLEAR_DAY);
           if (data=="clear-night") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.CLEAR_NIGHT);
           if (data=="partly-cloudy-day") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY);
           if (data=="partly-cloudy-night") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT);
           if (data=="cloudy") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.CLOUDY);
           if (data=="rain") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.RAIN);
           if (data=="sleet") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.SLEET);
           if (data=="snow") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.SNOW);
           if (data=="wind") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.WIND);
           if (data=="fog") skycons0.set("icon0", Skycons.FOG);
        });
    })(scope);
 
</script>
